26.16. uniq

history | cut -c 8- |sort -r | uniq -u
 	
# netstat -ant|fgrep ":"|cut -b 77-90|sort |uniq -c
      1 CLOSE_WAIT
      1 CLOSING
     88 ESTABLISHED
      7 FIN_WAIT1
      7 FIN_WAIT2
      3 LAST_ACK
      4 LISTEN
      1 SYN_RECV
      1 SYN_SENT
    177 TIME_WAIT
